mapper.select: SELECT PRNO,USNO,PRTITLE, PRCONTENT, PRPRICE, PRWRITEDATE, PRTALENT, PRDEAL,PRYOUTUBE,PRIMAGE,PRDATE,PRSTATUS,PRLATITUDE,PRLONGITUDE,PRADDRESS FROM ( SELECT PRNO,USNO,PRTITLE, PRCONTENT, PRPRICE, PRWRITEDATE, PRTALENT, PRDEAL,PRYOUTUBE,PRIMAGE,PRDATE,PRSTATUS,PRLATITUDE,PRLONGITUDE,PRADDRESS, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PRNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM W_PROJECT WHERE PRTALENT=#{prTalent} AND PRDELSTATUS = 'Y' ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY PRNO DESC
SELECT COUNT(PRNO) FROM W_PROJECT WHERE PRNO>0
SELECT PRNO,b.USNO,RVNO,RVCONTENT,RVDATE,RVGRADE,USNAME FROM W_REVIEW a JOIN W_USER b ON b.USNO = a.USWRITER WHERE PRNO=#{prNo}
SELECT a.*, b.* FROM W_PROJECT a JOIN W_USER b ON a.USNO = b.USNO WHERE PRNO = #{prNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO W_PROJECT VALUES (PROJECTSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{usNo}, #{prTitle}, #{prContent}, #{prPrice}, SYSDATE, #{prTalent}, #{prDeal}, #{prYoutube}, #{prImage}, SYSDATE, '대기중', #{prLatitude}, #{prLongitude}, '주소','Y')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM W_FINISHDEAL WHERE PRNO=#{prNo} AND USBUYNO=#{usBuyNo} AND FINSTATUS='거래완료'
mapper.update: UPDATE W_PROJECT SET PRTITLE=#{prTitle}, PRCONTENT=#{prContent}, PRPRICE=#{prPrice}, PRTALENT=#{prTalent}, PRDEAL=#{prDeal}, PRYOUTUBE=#{prYoutube}, PRIMAGE=#{prImage} WHERE prNo = #{prNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM W_PROJECT JOIN W_USER WU on W_PROJECT.USNO = WU.USNO WHERE PRNO = #{prNo}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM W_PROJECT WHERE PRTALENT=#{prTalent}) WHERE PRCONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchContent}||'%'
SELECT ROWNUM, a.* FROM W_PROJECT a WHERE ROWNUM < 5 ORDER BY PRNO DESC
SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM(SELECT PRNO, COUNT(RVGRADE) w, AVG(RVGRADE) e FROM W_REVIEW GROUP BY PRNO ORDER BY e DESC) c JOIN W_PROJECT d ON (c.PRNO = d.PRNO) ORDER BY c.e DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
